comment: No. Do not try to blackpill and claim that on us. No one here is THAT stupid as to sabotage ourselves this close to the election. Do not paint us as the ones stooping, you either are shilling, or you are just not wording this correctly. Either or, I don't agree with how you put this idea down, so, enjoy Gab.

# ::snt No. Do not try to blackpill and claim that on us. No one here is THAT stupid as to sabotage ourselves this close to the election.
